name: VeLM
description:
«Vivo entre los muertos..»
Town of San Lamar, believed to be the hell of the ancients, is dramatically affected by diseases and devastation. Has young Diego enough strength and courage to accomplish the Mission and return from the gloomy caves of Xibalba, where the terrifying Mayan Gods jealously guard their secrets?

VeLM is the atmospheric platformer in the spirit of metroidvania taking you to the world of the ancient Maya Gods. This mysterious story is about the journey into the underworld of a boy and his magical twin spirit, who are connected by Destiny. Solve the puzzles in the House of Knives, find out what the House of Jaguar hides, fight otherworldly creatures and uncover all the mysteries of the gloomy caves of Xibalba.

Game features:
  • Dive into a platform adventure in the underworld of the Mayan Gods
  • Learn an exciting story created with the support of mythology specialists
  • Explore the underworld, revealing its secrets as the hero develops new skills and obtains knowledge
  • The twin spirit associated with the main character is not only Destiny, but also the goal
  • Non-linear passage of the game allows infinite replayability
  • A unique soundtrack, written specially for the game, stylized to Maya music
